001package org.nasdanika.common;
002
003import java.io.File;
004import java.lang.reflect.Method;
005import java.net.URL;
006import java.util.Arrays;
007import java.util.Date;
008import java.util.HashMap;
009import java.util.List;
010import java.util.Map;
011
012import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
013
014/**
015 * Wraps an object as context with properties retrieved using getters. 
016 * Getters return values are processed as follows: list and array elements are addressed using indices, map elements using keys,
017 * {@link File}s are converted to absolute paths, other objects are wrapped into BeanContext. 
018 * @author Pavel
019 */
020public class BeanPropertyComputer implements PropertyComputer {
021        
022        private Map<String, Method> getters = new HashMap<>();
023        private Object target;
024
025        public BeanPropertyComputer(Object target) {
026                this.target = target;
027                if (target != null) {
028                        for (Method method: target.getClass().getMethods()) {
029                                if (method.getParameterCount() == 0 && method.getName().startsWith("get") && !Void.class.equals(method.getReturnType())) {
030                                        String propName = StringUtils.uncapitalize(method.getName().substring(3));
031                                        getters.put(propName, method);
032                                }
033                        }
034                }
035        }
036        
037        @Override
038        public String toString() {
039                return target.toString();
040        }
041
042        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
043        @Override
044        public <T> T compute(Context context, String key, String path, Class<T> type) {
045                if (Util.isBlank(path)) {
046                        return (T) target.toString();
047                }
048                String[] pa = path.split("/");
049                Method getter = getters.get(pa[0]);
050                if (getter == null) {
051                        return null;
052                }
053                try {
054                        Object result = getter.invoke(target);
055                        Object wrapped = wrap(result);
056                        if (wrapped == null || pa.length == 1) {
057                                return (T) wrapped;
058                        }
059                        if (result instanceof List) {
060                                int idx = Integer.parseInt(pa[1]);
061                                List<?> rList = (List<?>) result;
062                                if (idx >= 0 && idx < rList.size()) {
063                                        wrapped = wrap(rList.get(idx));
064                                        if (wrapped == null || pa.length == 2) {
065                                                return (T) wrapped;                                             
066                                        }
067                                        if (wrapped instanceof PropertyComputer) {
068                                                String subPath = String.join("/", Arrays.copyOfRange(pa, 2, pa.length));
069                                                return ((PropertyComputer) wrapped).compute(context, pa[1], subPath, type);
070                                        }
071                                        return null;
072                                }
073                                return null;
074                        }
075                        if (result instanceof Map) {
076                                wrapped = wrap(((Map<?,?>) result).get(pa[1]));
077                                if (wrapped == null || pa.length == 2) {
078                                        return (T) wrapped;                                             
079                                }
080                                if (wrapped instanceof PropertyComputer) {
081                                        String subPath = String.join("/", Arrays.copyOfRange(pa, 2, pa.length));
082                                        return ((PropertyComputer) wrapped).compute(context, pa[1], subPath, type);
083                                }
084                                return null;
085                        }
086                        if (wrapped == null || pa.length == 2) {
087                                return (T) wrapped;                                             
088                        }
089                        if (wrapped instanceof PropertyComputer) {
090                                String subPath = String.join("/", Arrays.copyOfRange(pa, 1, pa.length));
091                                return ((PropertyComputer) wrapped).compute(context, pa[1], subPath, type);
092                        }
093                        return null;
094                        
095                } catch (Exception e) {
096                        return (T) e.toString();
097                }
098        }
099        
100        private static Class<?>[] NO_WRAP = { String.class, Number.class, Date.class, URL.class };
101        
102        protected Object wrap(Object object) {
103                if (object == null) {
104                        return object;
105                }
106                for (Class<?> nwc: NO_WRAP) {
107                        if (nwc.isInstance(object)) {
108                                return object;
109                        }
110                }
111                return new BeanPropertyComputer(object);
112        }
113
114}
